thag6.13:0.4_0: Standing on the bank of the riverbank,
thag6.13:1.1_0: The rain saturates things that are covered up;
thag6.13:1.4_0: so the rain will not saturate it.
thag6.13:2.1_0: The world is beaten down by death
thag6.13:2.3_0: The dart of craving has laid it low,
thag6.13:2.4_0: and it’s always fuming with desire.
thag6.13:3.1_0: The world is beaten down by death
thag6.13:4.1_0: Three things are coming, like a wall of flame:
thag6.13:4.3_0: No power can stand before them,
thag6.13:4.4_0: and no speed’s enough to flee.
thag6.13:5.4_0: shortens your life by that much.
thag6.13:6.4_0: you have no time to be careless.
